entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tests in runtime can't target older version of .NET #103180
  • Disabling Blazor SIMD support breaks published app during runtime #103178
  • coreCLR fails to build on Windows arm64 machine #103175
  • Support W3C Baggage propagation without Activity #103174
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103170
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: bool System.Reflection.MetadataReader.TryGetString(StringHandle handle, Span<char> span, out int length); #103169
  • [API Proposal]: System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReader.GetDocId(EntityHandle) #103168
  • Crossgen2 fails with NullReferenceException in Internal.IL.EcmaMethodIL.GetExceptionRegions #103162
  • DataRows SetModified and SetAdded is not the same between the code and the document #103157
  • StackFrame.ToString has different formatting on native AOT #103156
    Future
  • `IndexOutOfRangeException` serializing large strings #103155
    Future
  • System.IO.Pipelines issue: Ureleased memory after reader.Complete #103149
  • Critically important services in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #103147

Closed

  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes severe memory spike on Android #102406
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement `ISpanFormattable` on `string` #103176
  • Improving support in .NET for W3C Baggage standard #103172
  • No way to set the .NET entry assembly from unmanaged host? Also, documentation seems to be wrong/unclear. #94139
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IEnumerable, IReadOnlyCollection and IReadOnlyList for {RO}Span and {RO}Memory #103164
  • ILLink analyzer tests - improve ref assembly acquisition #80504
    9.0.0
  • ILVerify.Program.Resolve throws NullReferenceException if missing DLL (regression) #103154
  • [wasm][wasi] No main function should be required when building a library #96869
    9.0.0
  • Excluding a library from interpreter would result in a crash #99248
    9.0.0
  • Large unmanaged memory growth (leak?) when upgrading from .NET 6 to 8 #95922
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #100299
    9.0.0
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` to represent Swift structs and enums in C# #100543
    9.0.0
  • Support not using Win32 APIs that aren't allowed for Microsoft Store UWP apps & games on NativeAOT #96510
    Future
  • error MSB3971: The reference assemblies for ".NETFramework,Version=v8.0" were not found #103059

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for invalid trim annotations in top-level method #103182
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Enable downwards optimization for multi-exit loops #103181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Testing] CET pipeline #103179
  • Bring back JIT support for core Vector64/128/256/512 APIs #103177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CET - remove writing to shadow stack #103171
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adding latency numbers for serialize instruction. #103167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove cached cgroup values (#102971) #103166
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add MIT license header to DotnetProxyTrustManager.java #103165
    area-System.Security
  • ConfigXmlReader is an IDisposable; Dispose it #103163
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Attempt to fix DuplicateAndClose_TcpServerHandler flaky test #103161
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [browser] Bundle assets inside of wasm file #103160
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector #103159
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix sending ICMP echo request when host is unreachable #103158
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add more ZipArchive tests to confirm the Zip64 fix does not affect reading zip files generatd with the old bug #103152
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Run System.Diagnostics.StackTrace tests with NAOT #103151
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable escape analysis and use in vn #103148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Tensor validations, scope changes, and TensorPrimitives methods #103005
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Re-write Android PBKDF2 one shot in Java #103016
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Propagate the exception from last retry #102974
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove vestigial HAVE_LARGE_SNPRINTF_SUPPORT checks #103106
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix typo in log message. #103036
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Disable downlevel tests for non-main branches in non-simple WasmBuildTests #103118
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Add net current to current names to make them match in net10 #103050
    area-Workloads
  • Set proper options for connected IPv6 raw socket #103127
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Minor cleanup of the Vector64/128/256/512 implementations to improve fallbacks #103095
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add Base64Fuzzer to the repo #103011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Fix ArgIteratorTemplate::GetNextOffset() for struct{Arr[], float} #103125
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Disable HAS_MORE_THAN_64_REGISTERS until we add complete support #103146
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` structs #102717
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x

Updated

  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    needs-area-label
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2469101 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Introduce IBufferedLogRecord #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `-dead_strip` linker optimization by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse and box+isinst+unbox.any patterns up front #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.0
  • [workload] Use the same naming as net9 workload #103049
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocation in HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode. #102909
    community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #103006
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Allow TypePreserve info to be applied multiple times #103140
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Start running pri1 tests on native AOT #103069
    needs-area-label
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added SVE `Prefetch*` APIs. #103094
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some failed CoreRoot R2R testcases. #103033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support using emscripten from Mono workload #2602

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VMR CI build failures during restore: The "RestoreTask" task returned false but did not log an error #41477
  • publish container fills up the /tmp/Containers/Content directory over time #41467
  • `slnx` wildcard support #41465

Closed

  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk unable to authenticate to private DevOps NPM feed since 0.5.105-alpha #41017
  • [NETSDKE2E] Running dotnet test in the mstest project will generate a redundant file on Linux and Mac #40398
  • Same SDK version, different contents #9321
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Dispose HttpClient and Stream in AddPackageParser #41490
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dispose HttpClient in WorkloadManifestUpdater #41489
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Dispose IDisposables in AssemblySymbolLoader #41487
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Disable CET compatibility setting on apphost when `CetCompat` property is set to `false` #41483
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Specify a version of cmake in global.json #41476
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [Static Web Assets] Remove tokens before trying to match paths in static web assets #41482
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add tab completion for 'dotnet nuget why' command #41430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add tab completion for 'dotnet nuget why' command #41448
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory for extracting nupkg in tests #41479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Resolve tokens before copying files #41468
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Dispose ZipArchive after usage in ExtractArchiveToDirectory #41449
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fingerprint all assets #41244
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Out-of-Support .NET Core SDK 2.x Download Link #41396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • remove installer from version file #41316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Permit trailing commas in method signatures and invocations #391
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Spec LDM decision that collection expressions targeting IEnumerable<T> implement nongeneric IList #7577

Updated

  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069
  • Add extension codegen details #8121

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please give users a choice to disable implicit usings and nullable before code is generated #73901
  • Proposal: Flow attributes on primary constructor parameters to generated fields/properties #73899
  • Remove usage of IGlobalOptionService from test helpers on Features layer and below #73898
  • Parameter names in target-typed new() expressions are missing among completions in compound assignment statements #73894
    Backlog
  • `Remove unused using` showing up multiple times in lightbulb #73893
    17.11 P3
  • Edit.Duplicate command does not insert trailing newline between original and duplicated code #73891
  • There is either a test gap, or an unnecessary attempt to lookup a local in a map in ClosureConversion #73889

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35006.210 #73890

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the code style package to build against Roslyn 4.8 #73900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid running generators when nothing has changed in a compilation tracker. #73897
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Apply editorconfig settings to moved ExternalAccess #73896
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [cherry-pick] Use separate async tracker for SG work instad of reusing workspace async tracker #73895
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73892
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • ExternalAccess layering #73887
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change global option change notification to batch all option changes #73882
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Support offering 'use collection' expr when assigning a List<T> to an IList<T> #73884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use separate async tracker for SG work instad of reusing workspace async tracker #73880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add struct base enumerator for interval trees. #73877
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion #73844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay reporting of pattern-based using diagnostics #73850
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Follow up on added ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prevent IDE0290 (convert to primary constructor) in ref struct #73869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal] Allow overriding the log level in IHttpLoggingInterceptor #56126
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56125
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #56124
  • improve .net documentation #56121
  • Updating Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly from 8.0.5 to 8.0.6 breaks Blazor Webassembly application #56119
  • Add an option to enforce case-sensitive URLs #56118
  • RedirectToRoute with default action doesn't include action in URL. #56117
  • ASP0022 - False positive without using intermediate variables with groups #56115
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] with IFormFileCollection in .NET 8 Minimal APIs #56114
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes, plainTextEmptyFilter #56113
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextWithFilter #56112
  • Identity based authentication using OpenIdConnect #56108

Closed

  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod to src/Middleware/CORS/src/Infrastructure/CorsConstants.cs #54772
    9.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, json_middleware #56014
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries, single_query #56073
  • Class level validation custom attribute is not supported. #50962
  • onClose callback not getting initiated when token expires #56110
  • onClose callback not getting initiated when token expires #56109
  • Unintended localization for DateTime strings #56053
  • Perf regression: fortunes, https, json #56089
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #56099
  • blazor: "Cannot submit the form 'create' because no form on the page currently has that name." Error occurs on submit of a form generated by blazor #55893

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56123
    area-infrastructure
  • SE.Redis DC backend / HybridCache : add net8.0 TFM #56122
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Updating the SDK to a version that contains the fingerprinting work #56120
    area-infrastructure
  • ASP0022 - Fix false positive for groups without using intermediate variables #56116
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update Components build and E2E testing instructions #56106
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 9.0-preview6
  • Update sdk daily builds table url #56085
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Remove dot that is added to URL #56075
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Retry CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesFromMultipleConnectionsWithSameUser #55955
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Move Weather page to the Blazor Web Client project when using WebAssembly-based interactivity #55877
    area-blazor
  • Add support for OpenAPI schema transformers #56093
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Annotate SignalR client for native AOT #56079
    area-signalr, NativeAOT
  • Fix Build From Source example #56105
    area-infrastructure
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add codefixer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `clrstack -f` shows no managed names with lldb in .NET 9 #4637
    9.0.0
  • Need help with SOS commands testing on RISC-V. #4716

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Resolve issues with FlyoutPage recreating the details page whenever it's navigated to #22919
    9.0-preview7
  • CollectionView ScrollTo scrolls to wrong group index in Android #22915
  • Setting BackgroundColor to null does not actually changes BackgroundColor #22914
  • Radio Button and CollectionView together do not work correctly #22913
  • CollectionView Header and Footer leak memory on iOS #22910
  • [Proposal Open] Move all compatibility project code to a separate repository #22909
    9.0-preview7
  • Label or Place holder value is not given for edit fields present on New recipe page: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppHomeScreen_New Recipe_AI4MAC #22906
  • Programmatic name is not given for "Hemberger" button: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppHomeScreen_Home Screen_AI4MAC #22904
  • [TEST] Review all (UI) Tests and remove platform-specific runs where possible #22902
    Backlog
  • MAUI on Android - when using ListView & ViewCell rows can appear in wrong order or sometimes be blank #22901
    Backlog
  • XAML Hot Reload breaks Prism Region application when running with Rider Debugger #22900
  • Title not updated after OnAppearing for TabbedPage in NavigationPage #22899
    Backlog
  • Display Bug On iOS about BoxView that under initial InVisible Layout #22897
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Display Bug On iOS about RadioButton in CollectionView #22896
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android]: CollectionView header template is not rendered #14603
    .NET 8 SR6
  • FontFamily is not set on Editor Placeholder on iOS #20839
    Backlog
  • [BUG][iOS] Maui 8.0.10+ - CarouselView - Previous item content disappears after scrolling to next item #22015
    .NET 8 SR6
  • NamedFontSize ignores FontAutoScalingEnabled #22732
  • Home Indicator Auto Hidden Not Working In MAUI #16247
  • Missing "appxrecipe" Maui Won't Deploy #22842
  • RoundRectangle Border is messed up when contains an Image with AspectFill #19877
    Backlog
  • Android Border with RoundRectangle Stroke does not correctly round corners of things within it #21173
    .NET 8 SR7
  • [ios] ContentPage.ToolbarItems is not currently being Garbage Collected (clicked event handler used) #22814
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Move Compatibility Project out to a separate nuget/workload #7548
    Under Consideration
  • MAUI Blazor project created earlier in .Net 7 is not launching now with VS 17.10.1 #22888
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22525
    .NET 8 SR7

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨
  • Attempt to fix crash in MauiApplication.OnCreate() #22911
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix Android CollectionView Header and Footer Template #22889
  • iOS Entry & Editor Placeholder font follows FontFamily property #22864
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-editor
  • Use corrected index for CellDisplayingEnded #22912
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 8 SR7
  • Fix appium-install.ps1 #22916
  • [release/9.1xx-preview5] Update versions for preview5 #22908
  • Fix Appium install PowerShell script #22883
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in `ToolbarItem` #22893
    memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Remove LINQ and reflection from EasingTypeConverter #19260
    area-animation, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, stale

Updated

  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • `Size` and `SizeF` should not throw on `NaN` #22890
  • [WinUI] Fix DateTimeFormatter for "ddd" #20045
    area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-dialogalert, stale
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `UseSqlite(SqliteConnection)` Behavior Change #33930
  • Migrations ignore IsRequred(true) in configuration (extending IdentityUser) #33929
  • Contains on entity type with list typed as object fails to translate #33928
  • c# ef core migration generate programatically #33926
  • No exception when db command cancelled #33925

Closed

  • TPH: SQL for persisting property that references collection of derived types is performed alphabetically instead of respecting the collection order #33918
  • Auto-generate compiled models for all contexts in the given assembly unless a single one is specified #33558
    9.0.0-preview6
  • Integrate precompiled query generation into the build process #33103
    9.0.0-preview6
  • Query: simplify IndexOf translation #18773
    9.0.0-preview6
  • Cannot use an interceptor with NetTopologySuite.EF for MSSQL #33910

PullRequests

Created
